name: Mark Zuckerberg
quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.

name: Warren Buffett
quote: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.

name: Elon Musk
quote: The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.

quote: Make every detail perfect, and limit the number of details to perfect.

quote: In the future, there will be no female leaders. There will just be leaders.
